The global settings applicable to all page elements

markup lines encoding, by default UTF-8 is used

member.name: T:Aspose.OMR.Api.TemplateProcessor
member.summary:
Class for processing templates and images.
Each instance of this class works with a single OMR template. It is able to recognize images of the template specified in the constructor.

member.name: M:Aspose.OMR.Api.TemplateProcessor.RecognizeMultiPageTemplate(System.String[],System.Int32)
member.param: The path to the images to recognize
(Optional) The recognition threshold in range (0..100). Only elements filled above threshold will be counted as filled.

member.name: M:Aspose.OMR.Api.TemplateProcessor.RecognizeImage(System.String,System.Int32)
member.param: The path to the image to recognize
(Optional) The recognition threshold in range (0..100). Only elements filled above threshold will be counted as filled.

member.name: M:Aspose.OMR.Api.TemplateProcessor.RecognizeImage(System.IO.MemoryStream,System.Int32)
member.param: Memory stream of image.
(Optional) The recognition threshold in range (0..100). Only elements filled above threshold will be counted as filled.

member.name: M:Aspose.OMR.Api.TemplateProcessor.RecognizeFolder(System.String,System.Int32)
member.param: The path to the folder where the images to recognize are located
(Optional) The recognition threshold in range (0..100). Only elements filled above threshold will be counted as filled.

member.name: M:Aspose.OMR.Api.TemplateProcessor.Recalculate(Aspose.OMR.Model.RecognitionResult,System.Int32)
member.summary: Updates recognition result using fine tuned parameters.
member.remarks: Use this method to improve the recognition results
member.param: The recognition result to update.
(Optional) The recognition threshold in range (0..100). Only elements filled above threshold will be counted as filled.

member.name: T:Aspose.OMR.CorrectionUI.CorrectionControl
member.summary: The User Control that allows recognizing images and correct and calibrate recognition parameters

member.name: M:Aspose.OMR.CorrectionUI.CorrectionControl.LoadAndDisplayImage(System.String)
member.summary: Load and display the image for the recognition
member.param: Path to the filled image to recognize

member.name: M:Aspose.OMR.CorrectionUI.CorrectionControl.ExportResults(System.String)
member.summary: Export the recognition results for the image
member.param: Path to the export

member.name: T:Aspose.OMR.Metered
member.summary: Provides methods to set metered key.
member.example:
In this example, an attempt will be made to set metered public and private key
[C#]
Metered matered = new Metered(); matered.SetMeteredKey("PublicKey", "PrivateKey");
[Visual Basic]
Dim matered As Metered = New Metered matered.SetMeteredKey("PublicKey", "PrivateKey")

member.name: M:Aspose.OMR.Metered.SetMeteredKey(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets metered public and private key
member.param: public key
private key

member.name: T:Aspose.OMR.Generation.Config.Elements.AnswerSheetConfig
member.summary: Represents AnswerSheet element. It allows adding choice boxes grouped in columns and rows. Use the answer sheet if you want to fit a lot of questions on a page since they are located close to each other.

member.summary: Indicates in which column to draw sheet

member.summary: Sets the number of columns to be drawn.

member.summary: The number of answer options for each question in the answer sheet.

member.summary: The starting index of the questions numbering

member.summary: Vertical margin of answer sheet. Set in pixels.

member.summary: Y coordinate. Set value to -1 for skip

member.summary: Grid element. Produce array of bubbles. Each filled bubble represent one symbol in composite value All marked symbols will be concatenated into single value

member.summary: Name of grid. Used as identifier in recognition

member.name: P:Aspose.OMR.Generation.Config.Elements.CompositeGridConfig.Column
member.summary: When element is drawn in multi-column parent - represent position.

member.name: P:Aspose.OMR.Generation.Config.Elements.CompositeGridConfig.ColumnsCount
member.summary: Amount of columns inside grid. Each column represent single symbol in result value Amount have to be equal to amount of columns

member.name: P:Aspose.OMR.Generation.Config.Elements.CompositeGridConfig.GridAlignment
member.summary: Grid alignment, indicates where grid should be drawn on page

member.summary: Indicates what type of element to draw at the start of the grid

member.name: P:Aspose.OMR.Generation.Config.Elements.CompositeGridConfig.GridOrientation
member.summary: Grid orientation: horizontal or vertical. Indicates how child elements should be positioned

member.name: P:Aspose.OMR.Generation.Config.Elements.CompositeGridConfig.XPosition
member.summary: Grid X position on page, overrides the alignment

member.summary: Grid Y position on page, overrides the alignment

member.name: P:Aspose.OMR.Generation.Config.Elements.CompositeGridConfig.Values
member.summary: Collection of strings that will describe possible symbols in each column. Column-specific values are placed in

member.name: P:Aspose.OMR.Generation.Config.Elements.CompositeGridConfig.ExtraRow
member.summary: Column-specific values that will be placed on top of default ones - . Presented as two dimensional array. First - row. Second - column. Each string represent text inside bubble. if string is null no bubble will be placed. Amount of columns have to be equal to

member.summary: Describe rotation of Grid element around its own axis. "90" - rotate CompositeGrid 90 degrees "-90" - rotate ComopositeGrid to -90 degrees

member.summary: Type of omr element. Required field for JSON serialization.

member.summary: Score value will be hidden from user. Score value still participate in recognition and total score amount. will be ignored.

member.name: F:Aspose.OMR.Generation.Config.Enums.ScoreDisplay.DisplayAsExtraColumn
member.summary: Score value will be displayed as extra column and will be visible to user. Score value participate in recognition and total score amount. will mark score column position among other columns. Please use only one such header

member.name: F:Aspose.OMR.Generation.Config.Enums.ScoreDisplay.DisplayInsideCell
member.summary: Score value will be displayed inside each cell. Score value will be places inside each bubble. In current version - one digit per bubble or exception will be thrown. will be ignored.

member.name: T:Aspose.OMR.License
member.summary: Provides methods to license the component.
member.example:
In this example, an attempt will be made to find a license file named MyLicense.lic in the folder that contains the component, in the folder that contains the calling assembly, in the folder of the entry assembly and then in the embedded resources of the calling assembly.
[C#]
License license = new License(); license.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic");
[Visual Basic]
Dim license As license = New license License.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic")

member.name: P:Aspose.OMR.License.Embedded
member.summary: License number was added as embedded resource.

member.name: M:Aspose.OMR.License.SetLicense(System.String)

remarks.p: Tries to find the license in the following locations:
2. The folder that contains the Aspose component assembly.
3. The folder that contains the client's calling assembly.
4. The folder that contains the entry (startup) assembly.
5. An embedded resource in the client's calling assembly.
Note:On the .NET Compact Framework, tries to find the license only in these locations:
2. An embedded resource in the client's calling assembly.

member.example:
In this example, an attempt will be made to find a license file named MyLicense.lic in the folder that contains the component, in the folder that contains the calling assembly, in the folder of the entry assembly and then in the embedded resources of the calling assembly.
[C#]
License license = new License(); license.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic");
[Visual Basic]
Dim license As License = New License license.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic") Can be a full or short file name or name of an embedded resource. Use an empty string to switch to evaluation mode.

member.name: M:Aspose.OMR.License.SetLicense(System.IO.Stream)
member.param: A stream that contains the license.

remarks.p: Use this method to load a license from a stream.
